title: TypeCon2005 Planning Meeting / NYC / Feb 3
content:
Attention, New York Typophiles: there will be a TypeCon2005 planning meeting on Thursday, February 3. Be prepared for brainstorming and fun.   
   
Meeting details:   
   
Thursday, February 3, 2005 / 6-8pm   
Type Directors Club   
127 West 25th Street, 8th floor   
New York, NY 10001   
Tel 212-633-8943   
   
Feel free to invite your friends and colleagues in the NYC metro area who might be interested. Everyone is welcome! Email me if you need more info about TypeCon2005 and to RSVP to the meeting.   
   
 [info@typesociety.org](mailto:info@typesociety.org) / [www.typecon.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317171939/http:/www.typecon.com/) / [www.typesociety.org](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317171939/http:/www.typesociety.org/)
author: tamye
